name: Just a Room (GameMasterThe1)
description:
An Annventure fan game by me. This game is more of a experiment to see if I can do animated maps rather then a full blown game.

Story:

Ann gets bored one day and decides to sketch her room. 

Credits:

Game made by: GameMaster1

Original Assets and character made by: Yoobii
Music made by: Hex g27629
